description: This source file defines an Android Activity named PreviewWebViewActivity, which displays a WebView configured to load a local server URL (http://localhost:3000). It is intended for developer-only use to preview web content within an Android application.

classes.name: PreviewWebViewActivity
classes.description: An activity that hosts a WebView to load a local development URL for preview purposes.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle method that initializes the WebView and loads the specified URL.

methods.name: createIntent
methods.description: Companion object method to create an Intent to start this activity.
